description: Analyze YouTube videos and extract insights using the Gemini Vision API. Get descriptions, summaries, and key moments effortlessly to enhance your video interactions.

geminiModelName.description: The Gemini model name to use. Defaults to gemini-2.0-flash.

capabilities.name: summarize_youtube_video
capabilities.description: Generates a summary of a given YouTube video URL using Gemini Vision API.

capabilities.name: ask_about_youtube_video
capabilities.description: Answers a question about the video or provides a general description if no question is asked.

capabilities.name: extract_key_moments
capabilities.description: Extracts key moments (timestamps and descriptions) from a given YouTube video.

capabilities.name: list_supported_models
capabilities.description: Lists available Gemini models that support the 'generateContent' method.
